remarks: A fraction of complex numbers is zero iff its numerator is.  Deduction form of ~ diveq0 .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
div1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divcld.3 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
diveq0ad $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) = 0 <-> A = 0 ) ) $.
